actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-808.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of August 9, 1955 (69 Stat. 539)(25 U.S.C. 415), as amended, to authorize a ninety-nine-year lease for the Moses Allotment Numbered 10, Chelan County, Washington.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Includes the Moses Allotment, Numbered 10, Chelan County, Washington, among those restricted Indian lands which may be leased by the Indian owners, with the approval of the Secretary of the Interior and for specified purposes, for a lease term of up to 99 years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of August 9, 1955 (69 Stat. 539)(25 U.S.C. 415), as amended, to authorize a ninety-nine-year lease for the Moses Allotment Numbered 10, Chelan County, Washington.
